classDiagram
  class Class01 {
    int amount
    draw()
  }
  Class01 --() bar
  Class02 --() bar

  foo ()-- Class01
---
  +-+-----+-+       
  | | foo0| |       
  +-+-----+-+       
       |            
       |            
       v            
+------|------+     
| Class|1     |     
+------|------+     
| amoun|: int |     
+------|------+     
| draw |      |     
+------|------+     
       |            
       |            
       v            
    +-----+         
    | bar |         
    +-----+
